## Source: ossf-package-analysis (03c95e188163b615484b4882358ea8d4a9411661fa3bb701052fd608c8f6c4b7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@seznam-diskuze/embed' @ 100.2.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
